pub.devrel.easygoogle

Class Google

  • java.lang.Object
    • pub.devrel.easygoogle.Google

  • public class Google
extends java.lang.Object
    Google is the user-facing interface for all APIs, acts as a controller for a number of sub-fragments that the user should not interact with directly. All user interaction should be driven by listeners given to the Google.Builder.

    • Nested Class Summary
